DataElement.preferredName: Person Preference Spoken Language Data Source Data Value Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The statistical characterization of human populations or segments of human populations (e.g., characterization by age, sex, race, or income).:The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable._Language communicated by means of words or sounds uttered through the mouth._The person or authoritative body who provided the information._The information contained in a data field. It may represent a numeric quantity, a textual characterization, a date or time measurement, or some other state, depending on the nature of the attribute.:The act, fact, or principle of giving advantages to some particular person, object, or course of action over others; designated as more desirable._Language communicated by means of words or sounds uttered through the mouth._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.
